message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you the opportunity to purchase our premium product. Given its high value and quality, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. We are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let us know if you are interested.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the introductory price, I'm looking to spend closer to $10,500.  This would be a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident the product would be a valuable addition to my collection.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. To meet somewhere in the middle, we propose an adjusted price of $10,750 for the product. This offer reflects a compromise between our original price and your counteroffer, aiming for mutual benefit.
